labbuilderconfig.name: Sample_WS2012R2_MultiForest
labbuilderconfig.description: Sample Windows Server 2012 R2 Lab Configuration containing two forests: - Alpha.com - Bravo.com Each forest is on an isolated subnet and contains a DC server, DHCP server and an Edge Server. The edge servers are also on a shared subnet (Domain Internal) enabling routing between the isolated subnets (Domain Private Alpha/Bravo). A forest trust is not established between the forests.
